name: Henie's Adventures: Sunshine
description:
Embark on a Bombastic Adventure!

While cruising through the inky void of space, a bothersome creature tries to eat your ship--How rude!  You don't like that, so  you find your ol' trusty broom and start whacking the pest. Your plan works a little too well, and your ship rocks as the creature sneezes, causing your jump-drive to jettison precious Ship Components to the planet below--A disaster!

Return Voyage

With a warm heart and a brighter smile you chase after your precious Components alongside your Hat companion! Can you find all Ship Parts and return home safe and sound?

Controls MoveWASD-controlsJump/Double JumpSpace bar Move CameraMouse Credits ArtworkProgramming & Unity DevelopmentPleinairKevin Moore A Curious Tea A Curious Tea Game & Level Design, WritingMusic Composition Sebastien Guanzon Akashic Owl
